author: pietverwilligen
body:
Fix to allow the digitizer to read conditions for detids with more than 96 strips.
Fix was already deployed in 62X_SLHC but was not yet in the main release.

Further on this PR contains a fix to the RPC customization and a fix to the RPCGeometryServ to name the chambers with more than 4 detids correctly (upgrade detids).
title: Rpc digitizer for upgrade75 xpr
